snippet: Computer espionage is growing ever more dangerous, and Washington directly blames Beijing of mounting attacks.
abstract: Editorial notes that Pentagon's annual report to Congress on China accuses its military of mounting attacks on United States government computer systems and defense contractors; contends that report adds urgency to pending talks with Chinese about cyberissues; underscores need for US to engage with China and other countries on what constitutes cyberaggression and how governments should respond.
lead_paragraph: Computer espionage is growing ever more dangerous, and Washington directly blames Beijing of mounting attacks.

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
keywords.name: subject
